text: Notorious is a 1946 American romantic thriller movie directed by Alfred Hitchcock and starring Cary Grant, Ingrid Bergman, Claude Rains, Leopoldine Konstantin, Louis Calhern, Moroni Olsen, Wally Brown. It was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures and was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1947. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1946 romance movies Category:1946 thriller movies Category:American romantic thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Alfred Hitchcock
title: Notorious (1946 movie)
